Name: endocrine organ benign neoplasm
Definition: An organ system benign neoplasm that is located_in endocrine glands which secretes a type of hormone directly into the bloodstream to regulate the body.

Name: cortisone reductase deficiency
Definition: An endocrine system disease characterized by failure to regenerate the active glucocorticoid cortisol from cortisone resulting in adrenal hyperandrogenism.

Name: parathyroid gland disease
Definition: An endocrine system disease that is located_in the parathyroid gland.

Name: endocrine gland cancer
Definition: An organ system cancer located_in endocrine system that is characterized by uncontrolled cellular proliferation of the hormone producing glands of the endocrine system.

Name: gonadal disease
Definition: An endocrine system disease that is located_in the gonads.

Name: obsolete joint derangement
Definition: An endocrine system disease that is located_in the gonads.

Name: pancreas disease
Definition: An endocrine system disease that is located_in the pancreas.

Name: thyroid gland disease
Definition: An endocrine system disease that is located_in the thyroid.

Definition: An endocrine system disease that is located_in the thyroid.

Name: obsolete equine infectious anemia
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results_in breakdown of red blood cells in horses

Name: pituitary gland disease
Definition: An endocrine system disease that is located_in the pituitary gland.
